thread.title: Real-life scenes designed to look like raytraced computer graphics
thread.title_full: Real-life scenes designed to look like raytraced computer graphics

author: Rob Beschizza
title: Real-life scenes designed to look like raytraced computer graphics
text:
Still File : "a series of 4 photographs recreating computer renderings as physical scenes. The photos' artifacts, surroundings, camera settings and lighting has been shaped intending to resemble 3d graphics of different types." 
Skrekkøgle's work is meticulous and required a deep understanding of optics, computer graphics and physical modeling! See the Flickr set too.
